document_data.name: Aunglass Roaryl
document_data.mainbody: '''Aunglass Roaryl''' was a legendary hero of [[Eskorn]], [[Laerakond]], and the founder of the [[Clan Roaryl|Roaryl]] dynasty.
document_data.History: Several centuries before the [[Spellplague]] of [[1385 DR]], Aunglass Roaryl led a rebellion against the [[dragon]] emperor [[Eskornamundyr]]. Thanks to his efforts, the rebels were able to overcome their dragon master and gain their freedom.
document_data.Legacy: He was the founder of Clan Roaryl, the ruling dynasty of Eskorn as of [[1479 DR]].
